Reviews.Title: So Far So Good
Reviews.Author: happyj
Reviews.Content: Have this for one month now and its working good so far.  will update after a few months of usage.

Reviews.Title: Great DVR
Reviews.Author: sylvester n.
Reviews.Content: This was a super deal for this product. I could not find a better price anywhere. I had a 4 channel everfocus and needed to expand to 10 cameras.
